extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Gay Dating Chat Hookup Locator if you are new to online dating and are looking for a boyfriend and are tired of other gay dating apps that have empty online chat rooms without any available gay men then you have come to the right place.After you install the app you will enter the gay social network and as soon as you setup your profile you will be able to romance older men or men your age - whatever you are into the gay finder will allow you to go local and find people nearby!When upload your profile pictures and videos make sure they are appropriate and represent you the best way so other boys can find you faster. It is free to browse the profiles of bears and guys alike whie you look for a gay hookup.Setting up a friends list is simple and will allow you to play games with people on your list. There are tons of hookups happening in the gay dating chat app every day using the gay radar function.For those of you who have a phone or a tablet equipment with a webcam you will be able to video chat with anyone on your buddy list as long as they have the feature enabled.Updated features included in this version:- fast gay hookup with other gay adults- gay date finder and boyfriend locator- hot gay men online dating guidesEnjoy this app! Thanks for downloading!

reviews.title: app is quite good
reviews.comment: Quite good no crashes or anything. One key factor to dating using apps is to exercise caution in meeting your date. Even if you are being set up by a close friend you can\'t be positive that they know the person they are setting you up with very well. Using the verified members option to search for guys is the best way to stay safe boys!
